title: Kathe Kollwitz
creator_credit: Cinecontact, Ron Orders and Norbert Bunge
brief_description: The life of Kathe Kollwitz is portrayed through her diaries and letters. Kollwitz was an artist who worked with graphic media - lithography, etching and woodcuts, and was aware of the problems of the urban working class and wanted her art to communicate directly with an audience.
description: The life of Kathe Kollwitz is portrayed through her diaries and letters. Kollwitz was an artist who worked with graphic media - lithography, etching and woodcuts, and was aware of the problems of the urban working class and wanted her art to communicate directly with an audience.
description_for_label: The life of Kathe Kollwitz is portrayed through her diaries and letters. Kollwitz was an artist who worked with graphic media - lithography, etching and woodcuts, and was aware of the problems of the urban working class and wanted her art to communicate directly with an audience.
